isys::IProcessEnvironment Class Reference
Defines access to operating system dependent implementation

Interface for access of some system dependent features and infos. More...

#include <IProcessEnvironment.h>

Detailed Description

Interface for access of some system dependent features and infos.

Member Function Documentation

virtual QStringList isys::IProcessEnvironment::GetApplicationArguments ( ) const [pure virtual]

Returns the arguments of command line for running application process.

Implemented in iqt::CProcessEnvironment.

virtual EnvironmentVariables isys::IProcessEnvironment::GetEnvironmentVariables ( ) const [pure virtual]

Returns the environment variables of the application process.

The key of the EnvironmentVariables map is the name of the environment variable.

Implemented in iqt::CProcessEnvironment.

virtual int isys::IProcessEnvironment::GetMainThreadId ( ) const [pure virtual]

Get current thread ID.

Implemented in iqt::CProcessEnvironment.

virtual QString isys::IProcessEnvironment::GetModulePath ( bool  useApplicationModule = false,
bool  onlyDirectory = false 
) const [pure virtual]

Returns the module file name.

If the useApplicationModule is true returns the name of application file/directory, otherwise the file name or (directory path) of module in which context this function was called. if onlyDirectory is true only directory path will be returned.

Implemented in iqt::CProcessEnvironment.

virtual QString isys::IProcessEnvironment::GetTempDirPath ( ) const [pure virtual]

Returns the standard temp path, that will be used by the application.

Implemented in iqt::CProcessEnvironment.

Returns the working directory of application.

Implemented in iqt::CProcessEnvironment.
